name: Dead Man's Legacy
flavorText: "Marteks would not flee before their superior numbers. He knew the time of his death was at hand. He stood his ground, loosing arrow after arrow as he was slowly overwhelmed." —Tales of the Wasteland
flavorTextHtml: "Marteks would not flee before their superior numbers. He knew the time of his death was at hand. He stood his ground, loosing arrow after arrow as he was slowly overwhelmed." —Tales of the Wasteland

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Multishot hits enemies below 60% health twice and its damage is increased by 150%. (Demon Hunter Only) [150 - 200]%
secondary.text: Multishot hits enemies below 60% health twice and its damage is increased by 150%. (Demon Hunter Only) [150 - 200]%
